project_preview_description.text: A web app that swap faces with random artificial generated faces

project_description.text: A group project by alumni-lab, the app allows user to upload an image, detects any faces found in the image, and swaps the face with an AI generated face from https://thispersondoesnotexist.com/. The project was built with React, face-api on the front-end and Express server, ImageMagick, and wuhuikai's FaceSwap program on the back-end.
In particular, I was responsible for connecting the front-end with the back-end, and making the FaceSwap program work on the back-end.
